Package game.items

Class Bottle

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.Bottle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, NonMultiTurnBuffItem
public class Bottle extends Item implements NonMultiTurnBuffItem

Bottle

Singleton instance of item that actor can store in their inventory. Able to consume this bottle and drink drinkable item. Follows stacks when actor wants consume this item.

    • consume

      public String consume(Actor actor)
      This method will run after actor consumes this item. It calls drinkable drink method. It removes item that is drinked
